channel.title: SmartWay
channel.description: Updated SmartWay content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: SmartWay Truck Tool Documents
item.description:
This page includes all documents supporting the use of the SmartWay Truck tool in the 2015 data year.

Use these guides to understand the tool data entry and submission process. Note that the data worksheets are available in the appendices of the Quick Start Guide, and are no longer listed as stand-alone documents.

  • Truck Carrier 2.0.16 Tool: What's New in this Version (PDF)(1 pg, 110 K, January, 2017)
    Version 2.0.16 of the Truck Carrier Tool contains a number of updates and revisions to the prior version, 2.0.15. These updates have been implemented to enhance the usefulness, clarity and accuracy of the Tool. This document summarizes those changes.
  • Truck Carrier 2.0.16 Tool: Quick Start Guide (PDF)(60 pp, 1 MB, January, 2017, EPA-420-B-17-002)
    Please review this before downloading and using the tool. This document gives you a brief overview of the tool and what you’ll need to complete it. It includes handy worksheets for entering your company’s information, which you’ll want to complete prior to opening the tool.
  • Truck Carrier 2.0.16 Tool: Technical Documentation (PDF)(115 pp, 3 MB, January, 2017, EPA-420-B-17-003)
    This document discusses tool data sources, calculations, and issues considered in determining methods employed in the tool.
item.dc:creator: Tjacks01

item.title: 2016 SmartWay Awardee Best Practices Webinar
item.description:
This presentation featured 2016 SmartWay Excellence Award recipients that shared freight efficiency strategies and environmental best practices. Carlos Bravo of Bacardi USA, Inc. and Don Craig of Transportation Insight, LLC explained how their companies attained top environmental performance in SmartWay by implementing best practices which reduced freight emissions.

  • Webinar recording: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/recording/7571038436474527748 Exit
  • 2016 SmartWay Awardee Best Practices (PDF)(26 pp, 5 MB)
    Webinar Slides
item.dc:creator: terry_anderson

item.title: Unlocking SmartWay Data for Shippers: Optimize Supply Chain Decision Making and Enhance CSR Reporting
item.description:
This webinar provides shippers with insights and observations that can help Shippers to use SmartWay Data in ways that optimize supply chain decision making which reduces emissions and costs.

  • Webinar recording: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/recording/4623308235351874052 Exit
  • Unlocking SW data for shippers (PDF)(41 pp, 3 MB)
    Webinar Slides
item.dc:creator: bo_zaks

item.title: Efficiency Begins at Home, but What About the Neighbors: Getting to Know Your SmartWay Carriers!
item.description:
This EPA presentation and panel discussion explores the experience of two well-known SmartWay Shippers and two of their SmartWay supply chain partners—one a logistics company, and one a truck carrier—and provides examples of how they have productively collaborated to increase freight movement efficiency.

  • Webinar recording: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/recording/8589760148359508228 Exit
  • Efficiency Begins at Home, but What About the Neighbors: Getting to Know Your SmartWay Carriers! - Presentation (November 16, 2016) (PDF)(28 pp, 2 MB)
    Webinar Slides
item.dc:creator: bo_zaks

item.title: US EPA SmartWay License Agreement
item.description:
This SmartWay Tractor and Trailer trademark license agreement is for manufacturers who intend to display the SmartWay designated logo (brand) in the interior of eligible trucks and trailers (e.g. having met the SmartWay designated specifications established by the EPA).

  • US EPA SmartWay LIcense Agreement (PDF)(7 pp, 198 K, November 8, 2016)
item.dc:creator: terry_anderson

item.title: SmartWay Mark Signature Page: Tractors & Trailers
item.description:
This SmartWay agreement is for companies and organizations who wish to comply with the SmartWay Graphic Standards and Usage Guide guidelines and requirements for using the SmartWay logos on SmartWay designated Tractors and Trailers.

  • SmartWay Mark Signature Page: Tractors & Trailers (PDF)(1 pg, 77 K, August 28, 2014)
item.dc:creator: terry_anderson

item.title: Truck Carrier Partner 2.0.15 Tool: Quick Start Guide, 2015 Data Year - United States Version (EPA-420-B-16-001, January 2016)
item.description:
This EPA document provides guidance for SmartWay Truck Carrier partners on how to join the SmartWay Transport Partnership; joining the right part of the program, the agreement requirements, equipment specifications, and gathering data necessary for participation. (EPA publication # EPA-420-B-16-001).

  • Truck Carrier Partner 2.0.15 Tool: Quick Start Guide, 2015 Data Year - United States Version (EPA-420-B-16-001, January 2016) (PDF)(54 pp, 904 K, EPA-420-B-16-001)
item.dc:creator: Tjacks01

item.title: Affiliates: Take the Affiliate Challenge
item.description:
This EPA presentation provides information on the SmartWay Affiliate Challenge, which is an opportunity for Affiliates to receive public recognition from the U.S. EPA for their exceptional outreach, educational, and policy activities to reduce air pollution and improve efficiency in the freight sector. The presentation describes the process for participating in the Challenge and includes resources available to Affiliates.

  • Webinar recording: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/recording/2341300438606308610 Exit
  • SmartWay Take the Affiliate Challenge - Presentation (November 3, 2016) (PDF)(31 pp, 3 MB)
    Webinar Slides
item.dc:creator: terry_anderson

item.title: Shippers: There’s a SmartWay for You
item.description:
This EPA presentation provides information on the various ways a retailer and or a manufacturer of goods can engage with EPA SmartWay. Engage as a Shipper Candidate by sampling the resources and content that the SmartWay program provides, or participate as a full partner; fully committed to efficient operations, clean air and CO2 emission reduction.  

Webinar recording: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/recording/3550680765498568964

  • There's a SmartWay for You, SmartWay Shipper Engagement (PDF)(20 pp, 1 MB)
    Webinar Slides
item.dc:creator: terry_anderson
